content: syncopation socks construction chart by mary henninger copyright november 2012 this pattern is provided free of charge for your personal use please notify me if you find errors in this pattern yarn shalimar breathless colorway ore needles addi lace #1 2 5mm 32 inch circular for sock addi lace #2 3 mm 32 inch for bind-off notions stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 8 stitches and 12 row per inch size men s size 12 method toe-up magic loop cast-on judy s magic cast-on heel gusset heel sometimes called fleegle s heel bind-off jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind-off or elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind-off increases i use backward loop left and backward loop right increases see photos at the end of pattern the increases are designated in the written instructions as m1r and m1l or use your favorite increase j note the pattern i used for syncopation is a modified version of lesley stanfield s #41 from the new knitting stitch library toe cast-on 16 stitches per needle using judy s magic cast-on method knit next round round 1 as per jmc instructions then knit following rounds round 2 thru 21 increasing to 36 stitches per needle as described below round instep side sole side 1 k16 k16 2 k1-m1r-k14-m1l-k1 18 sts k1-m1r-k14-m1l-k1 18 sts 3 k18 k18 4 k1-m1r-k16-m1l-k1 20 sts k1-m1r-k16-m1l-k1 20 sts 5 k20 k20 6 k1-m1r-k18-m1l-k1 22 sts k1-m1r-k18-m1l-k1 22 sts 7 k22 k22 8 k1-m1r-k20-m1l-k1 24 sts k1-m1r-k20-m1l-k1 24 sts 9 k24 k24 10 k1-m1r-k22-m1l-k1 26 sts k1-m1r-k22-m1l-k1 26 sts 11 k26 k26 12 k1-m1r-k24-m1l-k1 28 sts k1-m1r-k24-m1l-k1 28 sts 13 k28 k28 14 k1-m1r-k26-m1l-k1 30 sts k1-m1r-k26-m1l-k1 30 sts 15 k30 k30 16 k1-m1r-k28-m1l-k1 32 sts k1-m1r-k28-m1l-k1 32 sts 17 k32 k32 18 k1-m1r-k30-m1l-k1 34 sts k1-m1r-k30-m1l-k1 34 sts 19 k34 k34 20 k1-m1r-k32-m1l-k1 36 sts k1-m1r-k32-m1l-k1 36 sts 21 k36 k36 foot instep chart motif repetition 1 round instep-side sole-side 1 k3-p1 9 times k36 2 k3-p1 9 times k36 3 k3-p1 9 times k36 4 k3-p1 9 times k36 5 k3-p1 9 times k36 6 k3-p1 9 times k36 7 k1- p1-k3 8 times-p1-k2 k36 8 k1- p1-k3 8 times-p1-k2 k36 9 k1- p1-k3 8 times-p1-k2 k36 10 k1- p1-k3 8 times-p1-k2 k36 11 k1- p1-k3 8 times-p1-k2
